string-array.name: workout
string-array.item: Sweat is Fat Crying
Sore Today, Strong Tomorrow
I will Make Sweat my Best Accessory.
Making Excuses burns zero calories per hour.
Fit is Not a Destination, it is a way of life.
Sweat Is Magic. Cover Yourself up daily to grant your wishes.
Wake up, Work out, Kick Ass. Repeat.
The Hardest Lift of all is lifting your butt off the couch.
Sweat. Smile. Repeat.
One of the greatest moments is realizing that two weeks age, your body coudn\'t do what it just did
Sexy, Strong, and Ready
I Was Born To Lift
A change may be Just Around The Corner
Better Sore Than Sorry
Running Is An Argument between the part of your brain that wants to stop and the part that wants to keep going.
It\'s Pretty Simple, either you do it or you don\'t.
If You Change The Way You Look At Things,the things you look at Change.
The Difference Between This Week and Next Week is what you do for next seven days to achieve your goals.
Work Out. Eat Well. Be Patient, your body will reward you.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
